title: Kite Phase 1
description: Nestled in the dynamic town of Kitengela, Kajiado County, this inviting residential plot spans approximately 0.125 acres of fertile, well-drained soil perfect for building or gardening. Strategically located near Namanga Road for seamless access to Nairobi CBD and Jomo Kenyatta International Airport. Surrounded by schools, shopping centers, and emerging estates, it offers a blend of urban convenience and open savannah views. Ideal for your dream home or profitable investment in this rapidly expanding area.
